definition: one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: They said Ican't rap about bein?broke no more.
sentences.chinese: 她们说我没有办法再对于旁人弹词说唱了。

sentences.english: Speaking disparagingly of people in front of their friends.
sentences.chinese: 在旁人的朋友面前说一些瞧不起他的话。
当这些人失败的时候，那些看热闹的旁人会感到高兴。

sentences.english: The team was burned out and we decided that it was time to find someone else to carry the torch.
sentences.chinese: 整个团队已身心俱疲，我们觉得该把火炬传给旁人了。

sentences.english: The highest SAN DE is in the interests of others.
sentences.chinese: 最高的圣德便是为旁人着想。

sentences.english: Tom pushed his way to the gate of the club by sweeping others aside.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆推开旁人，挤到了俱乐部的门口。

sentences.english: Others can use fluent, playing from the heart envy.
sentences.chinese: 旁人能用英语对答如流，打从心底非常羡慕。

sentences.english: What other tricks can you do to live like no one is watching?
sentences.chinese: 你还知道哪些小把戏能让自己活得若无旁人？

sentences.english: Yet he adds, "They are not hardier than other people."
sentences.chinese: 接着他说，“可是他们并不比旁人更结实。”

sentences.english: Mr Thomas is used to brickbats.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯已习惯于旁人的言语中伤。

sentences.english: I would never-never-praise anyone else with you around.
sentences.chinese: 在你面前，我不能颂扬旁人。

sentences.english: In fact, he thinks, having a crowd around often makes things better.
sentences.chinese: 他认为，有旁人在场通常都会让事情变得更好一些。

sentences.english: Marius had not left the Gorbeau house. He paid no attention to any one there.
sentences.chinese: 马吕斯一直住在戈尔博老屋里，从不留意旁人的事。

sentences.english: The tenderness of lovers can ill brook the least jesting with the names of their mistresses.
sentences.chinese: 情人们一点也受不住旁人拿他们情侣的名字开玩笑。

sentences.english: He measures his self-worth by other people's likes.
sentences.chinese: 他用旁人的韦“赞”来衡量他的自我价值。

sentences.english: With Mary, he risked the wagging tongues of his community.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟要把马利亚娶过来，是要承受旁人的搬口弄舌。

definition: the person involved/the people holding power
to dismiss with a laugh/to make light of
